abstract: Executives at Kohlberg Kravis Roberts said market conditions hindered its ability to sell off investments through initial public offerings.
snippet: Executives at Kohlberg Kravis Roberts said market conditions hindered its ability to sell off investments through initial public offerings.

headline.main: K.K.R. Profit Drops 25%, Buffeted by Market Turmoil

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
